verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w warfare|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* hireling.

As a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* longeth \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w*, as \w the|strong="H5650"\w* hireling looketh \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* end \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H5650"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*;

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* also \w have|strong="H5157"\w* had \w empty|strong="H7723"\w* \w months|strong="H3391"\w*, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w have|strong="H5157"\w* \w numbered|strong="H4487"\w* \w to|strong="H3915"\w* myself wearisome \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w When|strong="H0518"\w* shall \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*? \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* shall look \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5399"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* sorrows \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* darkness.

\w My|strong="H1320"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* rottenness \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H3847"\w* filth \w of|strong="H1320"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w my|strong="H1320"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* withered \w and|strong="H1320"\w* drawn together.

\w My|strong="H3615"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* passed \w more|strong="H4480"\w* swiftly \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* web \w is|strong="H3117"\w* cut \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* weaver, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* \w without|strong="H4480"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* \w behold|strong="H7789"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*: thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* upon \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* passeth \w away|strong="H5927"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* hell \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w know|strong="H5234"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

Wherefore \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H2820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* month, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Am|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* whale, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast enclosed \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w prison|strong="H4929"\w*?

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w shall|strong="H4904"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w me|strong="H5162"\w*, \w and|strong="H5375"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4904"\w* \w be|strong="H5375"\w* \w relieved|strong="H5162"\w* \w speaking|strong="H0559"\w* \w with|strong="H6210"\w* \w myself|strong="H5162"\w* \w on|strong="H4904"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w couch|strong="H6210"\w*:

Thou wilt \w frighten|strong="H1204"\w* \w me|strong="H2472"\w* with \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* \w and|strong="H2865"\w* \w terrify|strong="H1204"\w* \w me|strong="H2472"\w* with \w visions|strong="H2384"\w*.

So \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H0977"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* rather chooseth hanging, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H0977"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* done \w with|strong="H3117"\w* hope, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w*: spare \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou shouldst \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*? \w or|strong="H3588"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w set|strong="H7896"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*?

Thou visitest \w him|strong="H6485"\w* \w early|strong="H1242"\w* \w in|strong="H7281"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* thou provest \w him|strong="H6485"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H7281"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* spare \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* suffer \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* down \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w spittle|strong="H7536"\w*?

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w keeper|strong="H5341"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*? \w why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w burdensome|strong="H4853"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* myself?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remove|strong="H5674"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w sin|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w seek|strong="H7836"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* morning, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w*.
